responses.text: Hello! I'm here to help you with various tasks. What would you like to work on today?
Hi there! I can help you with tasks like analyzing data, creating documents, answering questions, or working on projects. What interests you?
Hello! Feel free to tell me about anything you'd like help with - I'm here to assist!
Hi! To better assist you, could you share what you're hoping to accomplish or what kind of help you're looking for?
